response.text: Hi, I'm CERA, Welcome to the Ceramic Metaverse showroom!
Help me understand your persona — are you a master tiler, architect, or consultant at the showroom?
We have 1,200 m² of Walden Beige 20×120 cm (item no. 430686) available in our Schwarzenfeld warehouse. Would you like me to check whether the entire quantity is from the same batch (same firing)?
Yes, the current quantity comes from one batch. Would you like me to reserve 720 m² for 5 days?
R11/B can be offered as a special production, but only for a minimum quantity of 1000 m². Should I send an enquiry to product management?
For a wood look,  we recommend basic cleaning after installation with a neutral cleaner, followed by normal maintenance cleaning – no waxes or coatings.
response.clickableText: I am attaching the care instructions as a PDF

response.message: can you send me the quote
response.text: Of course – the offer for 720 m² of Walden Beige 20×120 cm (item no. 430686) will be automatically sent tomustermann@fliesenleger.de .
